label: 本朝世紀
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A history of Japan (935-1153). It is a history of Japan by Fujiwara Michinori, better known as Priest Shinzei, in forty-seven sections as found today, although how long the original was, is unknown.  The parts that are extant cover most of the period from about the middle of 935 to the close of 1153 (A, pp. 394-5). [藤原通憲、信西]
